about_the_game:
Your mission as the mercenary is to clean the unforeseen consequences of the dangerous experiment resulting in the vast majority of mutants in the area. You have access to the self-recharging jetpack, a variety of flamethrowers and other fire weapons, beware of the traps and monsters on the levels.
The mutants only fear the fire!

MAIN FEATURES


  • Travel through colorful and perilous biomes.

  • Use various fire-based blazing weaponry.

  • Wade through hazardous stages with the multi-mode jetpack.

  • Cinder rageful bosses and dozens of mutated creatures.


The remastered version contains over three dozen fixes, changes, improvements and innovations.

Some of the most important changes are:

- Enemies now run in fear when being burned, impacts with fire from specific attacks will make enemies run in random directions.
- You can now use the jetpack to damage enemies!
- Added a descent mode for the jetpack, which will be useful in platforming.
- Haptic feedback on most of the actions and unique haptic feedback pattern for every weapon when playing with a gamepad.
- Increased jetpack recharge speed.
- More clear visual indication on dealing damage to enemies besides setting them on fire.
- Balanced the number of enemies on levels for smoother progression.
- More pickups on levels.
- A clearer indication of the bosses’ melee attacks.
- Some user interface improvements.
- Added an automatic reload.
- Added pitfall indications.
- More frequent saves of the player progress.
- A slight secret areas indication.
- Improved fire effects.
- Ability to zoom out for better observation.
- A new soundtrack for whole game!

And many more.
